name: iPhone
description: Apple's original iPhone introduced multi-touch and combined an iPod, phone and internet communicator into one device.
fun_facts: First iPhone did not support third-party native apps — only web apps.
Announced by Steve Jobs on January 9, 2007, at Macworld.

name: iPhone 3G
description: Apple's iPhone 3G brought 3G speeds, built-in GPS, and access to the brand-new App Store, setting the foundation for today's smartphones.
fun_facts: Introduced the App Store, enabling third-party apps.

name: iPhone 4
description: the iphone 4 introduced a stunning glass and steel design, the high-resolution retina display, and apple's A4 chip, making it one of the most iconic leaps in iphone history.
fun facts: it was the first iPhone with a retina display, packing four times the pixel density of previous models
it introduced the front-facing camera, making facetime possible for the first time

name: iPhone 4s
description: The iPhone 4s, released in 2011, featured apple's A5 dual-core chip, improved 8-megapixel camera and introduced Siri, apple's voice assistant
